Title: Ya Shivu v Bolshom Dome Na Kholme
Actors: Rachel Brosnahan, Alex Borstein, Michael Zegen, Marin Hinkle
Plot: Midge's life is in a tailspin in the wake of Joel leaving. Midge and Joel's parents butt heads while trying to keep their family together. Susie pushes Midge to get back on stage and find her voice.
